overview: A young girl, Sandy, is locked in her house in the city center and is desperately looking for intercourse. The handsome boy on the opposite balcony is the ideal protagonist of her romantic fantasies. When the neighbor does not show up for the date, Sandy sinks into grief. The misunderstanding is soon resolved and Sandy goes for a walk with the boy, but the date does not turn out as she imagined.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

tagline: In the middle of a pandemic, a romantic girl tries to meet her neighbor across the balcony.
title: Sandy at home
